categoryRubrics.requirement: Patient in CCDA should contain proper address and telecom information
categoryRubrics.comment: Patient element has both address and telecom details

points.0: Address and telecom are not present
points.1: Either address or telecom present

categoryRubrics.requirement: Patient in CCDA should contain DOB
categoryRubrics.comment: Patient element contains Date of birth

points.0: DOB value not present
points.1: DOB value  present

categoryRubrics.requirement: Patient in CCDA should contain language indicator value as true or false
categoryRubrics.comment: Preferred Language attributes specified for patient

points.0: Language indicator value not present
points.1: Language indicator value present

categoryRubrics.requirement: All Effective Time elements under patient section should contain proper precision
categoryRubrics.comment: All the time elememts under patient sections has proper precision

points.0: Some Effective Time elements under Patient section missing proper precision
points.1: All the time elements under encounter section has proper precision

categoryRubrics.requirement: CCDA document should contain encounter section
categoryRubrics.comment: Encounter Section present in CCDA document

points.0: Encounter section is absent
points.1: Encounter section is present

categoryRubrics.requirement: Service delivery location should be present within each encounter activity
categoryRubrics.comment: All encounter activities contain SDL element

points.0: None of the encunter activity contains SDL element
points.1: > 0% and < 25% encounter activities have SDL element
points.2: > 25% and < 50% encounter activities have SDL element
points.3: > 50% and < 75% encounter activities have SDL element
points.4: > 75% and < 100% encounter activities have SDL element
points.5: All encounter activities contain SDL element

categoryRubrics.requirement: All effective time elements under encounters section should contain proper precision
categoryRubrics.comment: Some effective time elements under encounter are not properly precisioned

points.0: Some time elements under encounter section missing proper precision
points.1: All the time elements under encounter section has proper precision

categoryRubrics.requirement: All translation elements should contain root code element
categoryRubrics.comment: All the teanslations under encounter section has root element

points.0: Some Translations are present with the root elements being null flavors.
points.1: All the Translations under coded elements has root elements
